articles.title: Dead & Company Fits Tour Debuts Into Noblesville Concert - JamBase
articles.description: Dead & Company offered trio of tour debuts during their stop at Ruoff Music Center in Noblesville, Indiana on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Dead & Company continued their 2022 summer tour at Ruoff Music Center in Noblesville, Indiana on Tuesday. The band had a trio of tour debuts in store for the venue formerly known as Deer Creek.
